name: Good Housekeyping!
description:
Blow, vacuum, and blast your way through a colossal pile of Wifedice(tm) brand shipments in this mad dash to find your car keys before your house explodes! Throw your (as yet to be unboxed) keys at your (as yet to be unboxed) car to win the game!

Controls:
WASD - Move

Left-click / E - Pick up and drop item

Right-click / F - Use item

Credits
Team

Claudia Jodlowski - Programmer

Luke Quirion - Programmer

Jacob Livingston - 3D Artist, Level Designer

Olly Glenn - 2D Artist, Sound, UI, Producer
